name: super-fang
effect: Inflicts typeless damage equal to half the target's remaining HP.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Attacks with sharp fangs
and cuts half the foe’s HP.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Attacks with sharp fangs
and cuts half the foe’s HP.

with sharp fangs
and halves the

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user chomps hard
on the foe with its
sharp front fangs.
It cuts the target’s
HP to half.
